divs: Sighting Detailsabout an hour after an earlier sitting of a larger reflective object which disappeared another object popped up and moved slowly up and to the left (west) then sat stationary for 15 min. while watching the object another object of the same size and color came from the west at a very rapid speed and stopped next to the other object then circle it and moved rapidly to the east and stopped and hovered for 15 min. then another of the same object came to the second object from the south and stopped next to it and hovered for 5 min. then all three objects vanished.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
